1053760.name: Arkio
1053760.description:
Design better buildings, together. With Arkio, you can ideate, review and present your work in a powerful collaborative design environment, saving time and money.

The new Arkio 2.0 elevates design collaboration to a new level with built-in AI rendering, layers, voice transcription, issue export, and more.

Immerse yourself in Arkio using VR or work on your PC, Mac, tablet or phone. Import large 3D models, including Revit, Rhino, SketchUp, and Archicad projects, to experience them at 1:1 scale, fully immersed, or in Mixed Reality. Mark up, comment and try new design ideas with ease. With Arkio, you can make good designs great!

  • Load large 3D models from your favorite AEC tools 

  • Present your designs and guide up to 24 users around your scene in VR desktop and mobile devices

  • Generate beautiful renders with the Arkio AI camera that can be converted into collaborative frames

  • Capture notes and issues using text or voice and share them with others via Arkio Cloud 

  • Work on any scale - use your hands to work on models at scale or move things at human scale, like having design superpowers.

  • Ideate together using Arkio’s built-in modeling tools and shapes, and export your work back to your favorite AEC design tool

  • Toggle layers, add sections, do sun studies, add maps and 3D buildings and more!

Visit our website to access our plugins Installer and learn more about Arkio for other supported devices. Some features require a paid plan. Start for free, then upgrade to Plus, Pro or Enterprise to experience the full power of Arkio.
